Fix Dapper mapping bug and improve chat import

- Fix Dapper column mapping: add explicit aliases (chat_id as ChatId, etc.)

- Add chats table to store chat titles
- Save chat info (title, type) when processing messages
- Update /admin chats to show chat names
- Add /admin chats to help menu
- Fix HTML parser XPath selector for Telegram export
- Add fallback selector and debug logging for import
